title: Sri Lanka Air Force celebrates 71st Anniversary today
content: The Sri Lanka Air Force (SLAF) will celebrate its 71st Anniversary today (2) under the Commander of the SLAF, Air Marshal Sudarshana Pathirana. This year the celebration will be held at the Air Force Base Katunayaka.The SLAF was formed on 2 March 1951 as the Royal Ceylon Air Force and when Sri Lanka became a Republic in 1972 the Royal Ceylon Air Force was re-designated as the Sri Lanka Air Force.
